name: my scary fruit game
description:
Control a lovable dinoghost as they attempt to catch as many fruit as possible, with scary yet zany effects that change the game's flow! Watch out for the trash and keep yourself in control!

CONTROLS

  • A or Left-Arrow to move left
  • D or Right-Arrow to move right
  • ESC to pause the game

CREDITS

  • Lucas (rhythm07): 
    • Lead Game Design / Programming 
  • Nam (Xerialbole): 
    • Art / Assets / Sounds

Yes, the orange SFX is the vine boom.
